tvCompatibility.ownDeviceTitle: Already Own a Digital TV Box?
tvCompatibility.ownDeviceDescription: Great news! If you already have a compatible digital TV box at home, you can use it with our TV service and save money. Our system works seamlessly with select Motorola/Arris models that deliver professional-grade performance.
tvCompatibility.importantNoteDescription: Digital TV boxes previously used with other operators are typically operator-locked or configured in ways that prevent compatibility with our service. For guaranteed compatibility, we recommend using devices that haven't been tied to other providers.

reliableAndHighSpeedConnectivity.description: With over a decade of experience, Internetport ensures that your IT infrastructure operates seamlessly, enabling you to focus on what matters most. Our broadband services are designed to provide fast and dependable internet access, supporting activities like remote work, online gaming, and streaming.

localSupportYouCanTrust.name: Local Support You Can Feel Safe With
localSupportYouCanTrust.description: Nestled in the heart of Hälsingland, our passionate team is here to provide a fresh, personal touch to your experience. Whether you have a quick question or need help with something technical, we're just a call away, ready to make everything simple and straightforward. Your peace of mind is our priority, and we've got you covered every step of the way.

featureSection.getOnline100SubDesc: Enjoy fast, reliable internet with speeds up to 100 Mbps.
featureSection.getOnline100Desc: Enjoy fast, reliable internet with speeds up to 100 Mbps. Perfect for browsing, streaming HD content, and staying connected with family and friends. Whether you're working from home or enjoying your favorite online content, our 100 Mbps plan has you covered.
featureSection.getMoreSpeed250Desc: Need a little more speed? Our 250 Mbps plan offers smooth streaming, quick downloads, and reliable connectivity for larger households or small businesses. Great for multiple devices running at once, perfect for families and remote workers.
featureSection.goFaster500Desc: For the ultimate internet experience, the 500 Mbps plan gives you ultra-fast speeds for everything you need. Stream in 4K, download large files in seconds, and enjoy seamless video calls and gaming with no lag. This plan is ideal for tech-savvy households and high-demand environments.
featureSection.powerUp1000Desc: Unlock the full potential of your online experience with our 1000 Mbps plan. Get lightning-fast speeds for multiple devices, uninterrupted streaming, and faster file transfers. Whether you're a gamer, a content creator, or simply need the best internet for your home, this is the perfect choice.

ourStory.paragraph: At Internetport, we're all about making your digital life simple, safe, and future-ready. With over a decade of experience, we offer flexible, tailored services that grow with you. Without the hassle of long-term commitments. From our home in Hälsingland, we're committed to delivering quality with a personal touch, creating lasting connections along the way. Whether you're looking for broadband, hosting, or security solutions, we're here to help you take the next step.

featureFourColumns.introBold1: comprehensive and affordable internet, telephony and entertainment
featureFourColumns.introPart2: solution? Our broadband, telephony, TV and VPN services provide high-speed connectivity,
featureFourColumns.introPart3: , premium entertainment, and enhanced security for your home. With
featureFourColumns.introPart5: , you can enjoy smooth streaming, gaming, and remote work. Plus, our
featureFourColumns.introPart6: ensure complete entertainment and online privacy protection.
featureFourColumns.broadbandDescription: Discover lightning-fast, reliable broadband that keeps you connected with minimal delay and direct access to the heart of the internet. Whether you're gaming, streaming, or working from home, we make sure your online experience flows smoothly. With us, you get straightforward pricing, no hidden costs, and flexible support that adapts to your needs.
featureFourColumns.telephonyDescription: Say goodbye to high phone bills with our simple and affordable IP telephony. Stay connected with loved ones, knowing you're getting great value without the worry of expensive calls.
featureFourColumns.tvDescription: Experience high-quality entertainment with our comprehensive TV packages. From premium channels to streaming capabilities, enjoy crystal-clear picture quality and a wide variety of content for the whole family.
featureFourColumns.vpnSecurityDescription: Protect your online privacy with a secure VPN. Shield your data from hackers, browse anonymously, and access geo-restricted content with ease.

Whether it's broadband, telephony, or security, our dedicated team is ready to assist you with tailored solutions, ensuring you stay connected without hassle. We're here to make your experience seamless, every step of the way.

aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.intro: Internetport is a reliable and experienced IT provider with over ten years of expertise. We offer flexible, affordable, and scalable IT solutions, focusing on helping businesses and individuals through personal commitment and high-quality service.
aboutUs.mainContent1: Internetport is a reliable and experienced IT provider headquartered in Hudiksvall. With over ten years of experience in web development, server hosting, broadband solutions, telephony, system development, and service desk solutions, we have the knowledge and expertise to take your project from idea to final solution with short decision paths.
aboutUs.mainContent2: As a challenger among the major IT giants, our business idea is to personally and passionately deliver affordable and scalable IT solutions that lay the foundation for successful companies. Our services offer maximum flexibility with no binding period. As a customer, you can adjust your concept up or down at short notice, depending on your business situation.
aboutUs.mainContent3: At Internetport, in the scenic region of Hälsingland, we understand that running a business can be like a roller coaster, especially in uncertain times. We believe that business freedom creates security and the courage to grow. A win-win concept that benefits both parties.
aboutUs.mainContent4: Internetport ensures that everything IT-related in your company runs smoothly so that you can focus on your core business. We assist with everything from broadband and telephony to advanced, customized IT solutions such as dedicated servers, e-commerce platforms, and comprehensive solutions for retail chains. If you're looking for a reliable, high-performance, and cost-effective partner – then Internetport is the right choice for you.
aboutUs.mainContent5: Our data center consists of two server halls, one in Hudiksvall and one in Kista, just outside Stockholm. The server halls are 150 m² and 400 m² respectively, fully equipped for running critical IT environments. They are fully redundant and fault-tolerant when it comes to cooling systems, power supply, and internet connections. We are certified according to the PCI Data Security Standard (PCI DSS), which is required for handling secure card transactions. Today, we host thousands of physical and virtual servers. We have 10 Gbit bandwidth to the internet, and our telephony infrastructure handles up to 12,000 calls daily.
aboutUs.mainContent6: At Internetport, we are nothing without our employees. Our team consists of experienced and skilled system developers, system consultants, IT technicians, and service desk staff. Every day, we work to deliver high-quality IT services and excellent customer service at competitive prices.
aboutUs.valuesIntro: At Internetport, we believe in long-term and reliable solutions that make a difference. With a combination of experience, commitment, and curiosity, we strive to deliver IT services that not only meet today's needs but also create opportunities for the future.

values.sustainableDescription: We build long-term, sustainable IT solutions that streamline and simplify work processes across various industries.
values.costEffectiveDescription: We offer affordable and tailored full and partial solutions backed by over 15 years of experience, making us a cost-effective partner.
values.committedDescription: We are a close-knit team of nearly twenty employees who strive daily to provide the best customer experience and service.
values.responsiveDescription: With a down-to-earth and humble approach, we carefully listen to our customers' needs and build trust by delivering on our promises.
values.curiousDescription: We are passionately curious about new solutions that simplify and improve our processes and customer experiences.
values.innovativeDescription: We aim to implement innovative IT solutions through partnerships with leading providers and continuous updates.

contactUs.title: Contact us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about your current services or simply want to learn more about what we offer, feel free to reach out. You can contact us by phone, email, or by filling out the form, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

career.imageAlt: A man smiling in a meeting
career.workingAtInternetportPara1: At Internetport, we work every day to help our customers stay at the forefront of technology. This means we need to be attentive to our customers' needs, have high technical competence, and understand how to offer the best solution based on the customer's wishes and requirements as well as finally deliver technically advanced solutions that meet high demands in terms of operational reliability, quality, and service level.
career.workingAtInternetportPara2: We believe it is important that our employees enjoy their work. If they do, we think they will be more engaged and perform better. This ultimately leads to satisfied customers, which is what we always strive for. If you have the qualities required to deliver the above, we think you would be a great fit for us at Internetport!
career.attractiveEmployerPara1: As an employer, we are proud of our low staff turnover. Our employees enjoy their work, which creates continuity in our customer relationships. Personal relationships and high recognition are two things that our customers appreciate in our staff.
career.attractiveEmployerPara2: At Internetport, we offer attractive and flexible working hours with the possibility of working from home. Overall, we are a flat and unpretentious organization where every employee works together to contribute to our winning concept. Are you our next team member?
career.livingInHudiksvallTitle: Living, working, and residing in Hudiksvall
career.livingInHudiksvallPara: Internetport is located in the coastal city of Hudiksvall in Hälsingland. Here, you have all the opportunities to create a great life. A diverse and exciting business landscape with successful companies, attractive housing at good prices, proximity to great transport connections, stunning nature right around the corner, and a rich and varied cultural life.
career.workWithUsTitle: Do you want to work at Internetport?
career.workWithUsPara: We are always interested in getting in touch with the right people. Even if we do not have an open position right now, an opportunity may arise in the future! Send your CV to

cookiesPolicy.whatAreCookiesText1: INTERNETPORT's website uses cookies. Cookies are small text files stored on the visitor's computer that can be used to track their activities on the website. There are two main types of cookies:
cookiesPolicy.whatAreCookiesList1: A permanent cookie remains on the visitor's computer for a specified period.
cookiesPolicy.whatAreCookiesList2: A session cookie is temporarily stored in the computer's memory while the visitor is on a web page. Session cookies disappear when you close your browser.
cookiesPolicy.howAreCookiesUsedText1: INTERNETPORT uses cookies to improve the website for visitors, for example, by adapting it to their preferences, choices, and interests, helping to keep track of items in their cart, managing purchases, ensuring visitors remain logged in, customizing services to show relevant ads, and fulfilling commitments during purchases.
cookiesPolicy.howAreCookiesUsedText2: Permanent cookies are used to store any personal settings on INTERNETPORT, so you don't have to redo choices every time you visit the website. They also help make information and marketing as relevant as possible for you. Session cookies are used to collect statistics on website usage.
cookiesPolicy.howAreCookiesUsedText3: By using INTERNETPORT's website and/or agreeing to INTERNETPORT's terms and Privacy Policy, you consent to the use of cookies as described here.
cookiesPolicy.howAreCookiesUsedText4: If you do not accept the use of cookies, you can disable them in your browser's security settings. You can also configure your browser to ask for confirmation each time INTERNETPORT's website attempts to place a cookie on your computer. Previously stored cookies can also be deleted via your browser settings. See your browser's help pages for more information. You can also manually delete cookies from your hard drive at any time.
cookiesPolicy.howAreCookiesUsedText5: Note that if you choose not to accept cookies, you will not be able to make purchases on the website. Some functionalities may also be limited.
cookiesPolicy.howToDeleteCookiesText1: If you no longer want to use cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings. You can also configure your browser to prompt you each time INTERNETPORT's website tries to place a cookie on your computer. You can also use your browser to delete previously stored cookies.
cookiesPolicy.howToDeleteCookiesText2: How you delete cookies depends on the browser you are using. If you use a PC, you can delete cookies using the shortcut
cookiesPolicy.howToDeleteCookiesText3: . If this does not work or if you use a Mac, click the link for your browser: Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, Opera, Safari, Flash cookies.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms And Conditions
termsAndConditions.introduction: For Internetport's private customers, including specific terms for broadband, telephony, and equipment, as well as information on the right of withdrawal. Applies from 2022-05-16 and until further notice.
termsAndConditions.privacy: Our customers' privacy is important to us. Internetport Sweden AB is responsible for the processing of the Customer's personal data in accordance with the Agreement. For information on how we handle your personal data, please refer to our privacy policy available on Internetport.se.
termsAndConditions.section1Text1: 1.1 Internetport AB, org. no: 556767–0277 ('Internetport') provides internet services ('Service' or 'Services') and equipment ('Equipment') to consumers ('Customer') in accordance with these general and specific terms, which form part of the agreement ('Agreement') between Internetport and the Customer.
termsAndConditions.section1Text2: 1.2 The content of the Service is specified in the descriptions available at any given time on the website Internetport.se ('Website').
termsAndConditions.section1Text3: 1.3 The general terms also apply to supplementary services that the Customer and Internetport agree on after the Agreement has been concluded. Such supplementary services shall be considered part of the Service. The specific terms apply in addition to the general terms for certain Services and when purchasing Equipment.
termsAndConditions.section1Text4: 1.4 Only private individuals can be listed as payees for private subscriptions.
termsAndConditions.section2Text1: 2.1 To enter into the Agreement with Internetport, the Customer must be of legal age or have the consent of their guardian.
termsAndConditions.section2Text2: 2.2 The Agreement between the Customer and Internetport includes:
termsAndConditions.section2List1: Internetport's confirmation of the Customer's order of the Service.
termsAndConditions.section2Text3: In case of conflicts between the above documents, they shall apply in the order listed above.
termsAndConditions.section2Text4: 2.3 The Agreement is considered concluded when the Customer has placed an order and Internetport has confirmed the Customer's order via email, the Website, telephone, letter, or online portals provided by city networks or special communication operators.
termsAndConditions.section2Text5: 2.4 If the Agreement has been concluded remotely, for example, after the Customer's order via Internetport's website or an online portal, the Customer has the right to withdraw from the Agreement under the Distance and Off-Premises Contracts Act (2005:59). Information about the Customer's right of withdrawal is available on the last page of these general terms.
termsAndConditions.section3Text1: 3.1 Internetport has the right to perform a standard credit check after the Customer's order. If there is a justified reason, Internetport has the right to conduct a new credit check during the term of the Agreement.
termsAndConditions.section3Text2: 3.2 Internetport reserves the right to require acceptable security or advance payment if the Customer's creditworthiness is insufficient.
termsAndConditions.section3Text3: 3.3 Internetport reserves the right to refuse all or parts of the Agreement if the Customer has insufficient creditworthiness, see section 12.1.
termsAndConditions.section4Text1: 4.1 The Website provides current information about fees, prices, and the Customer's invoices (under the login service 'My Pages').
termsAndConditions.section4Text2: 4.2 The fee may consist of variable and/or fixed fees, any one-time fees, billing fees, and start-up fees. The Customer shall pay fixed and variable fees in accordance with the terms specified in the Agreement for each respective Service and/or hardware as well as the applicable price list. For the current price list, contact customer service.
termsAndConditions.section4Text3: 4.3 Billing is done in advance. The first invoice issued when subscribing to a new service always covers fees for two months, i.e., the current month and the following month. For example, if the Customer orders a broadband service for SEK 200/month starting on September 1, the first invoice will amount to SEK 400 and cover both September and October. Subsequent invoices are issued monthly according to the selected billing period.
termsAndConditions.section4Text4: 4.4 Unless otherwise agreed, fixed fees shall be paid for one (1) or three (3) months in advance.
termsAndConditions.section4Text5: 4.5 If the Customer has chosen an email invoice and the provided email address is incorrect, or if the invoice does not reach the Customer's email address, Internetport has the right to send a paper invoice instead, subject to a fee.
termsAndConditions.section4Text6: 4.6 The Customer is obligated to pay the invoiced amount within the specified time and in the manner indicated on the invoice or on the Website.
termsAndConditions.section4Text7: 4.7 If payment is not received by Internetport, or by the party designated by Internetport as the payee, by the due date stated on the invoice, Internetport has the right to charge late interest in accordance with the Interest Act and has the right to charge reminder and collection fees in accordance with the law.
termsAndConditions.section4Text8: 4.8 Unless otherwise stated, prices are excluding VAT and 25% VAT will be added to the invoice.
termsAndConditions.section5Text1: 5.1 An email sent to the email address provided by the Customer shall be considered received by the Customer on the same day it is sent.
termsAndConditions.section5Text2: 5.2 A letter sent to the Customer's last provided postal address shall be considered received three (3) business days after dispatch.
termsAndConditions.section5Text3: 5.3 An SMS sent to the phone number provided by the Customer to Internetport shall be considered received by the Customer on the same day it is sent.
termsAndConditions.section5Text4: 5.4 Messages via social media shall be considered received by the recipient on the same day they are sent.
termsAndConditions.section5Text5: 5.5 Depending on technological advancements, other methods than those listed above may be used to contact the Customer.
termsAndConditions.section6Text1: 6.1 Internetport's customer service is not obligated to resolve issues or provide support regarding computer equipment, network cards, routers, phones, operating systems, or software that has not been provided by Internetport.
termsAndConditions.section6Text2: 6.2 The website specifies the times and methods through which customer service is available.
termsAndConditions.section6Text3: 6.3 Internetport has the right to perform updates, maintenance, and modifications via the internet on equipment provided or designated by Internetport that is required for the customer to connect to or use the service in a reliable and secure manner. The customer is responsible for keeping the equipment accessible for such maintenance.
termsAndConditions.section7Text1: 7.1 The services are intended for normal private use and regular usage by the customer and members of the customer's household. The customer may not use or grant access to any of the services for the purpose of reselling the service or for any commercial purposes.
termsAndConditions.section7Text2: 7.2 To use the service, the customer must configure the necessary settings and have access to equipment such as connections and hardware that meet Internetport's requirements and guidelines.
termsAndConditions.section7Text3: 7.3 The customer is responsible for the use of the service, even if it is used by someone else who has gained access through the customer.
termsAndConditions.section7Text4: 7.4 The customer must store passwords and other codes associated with the service securely to prevent unauthorized access.
termsAndConditions.section7Text5: 7.5 If the customer suspects that an unauthorized person has gained access to their codes or otherwise gained unauthorized access to the service, this must be reported to Internetport customer service immediately.
termsAndConditions.section7Text6: 7.6 The customer is also responsible for unauthorized use of the service if they have failed to fulfill their obligations as stated above or if they have intentionally or negligently granted unauthorized access to the service.
termsAndConditions.section7Text7: 7.7 The customer is always required to pay fixed fees for the service, even if they are not otherwise responsible for unauthorized use of the service.
termsAndConditions.section8Text1: 8.1 If a fault or interruption occurs in the Service, a fault report must be made via the troubleshooting guide on the Website, by phone to Internetport's customer service, or in another manner specified by Internetport.
termsAndConditions.section8Text2: 8.2 Internetport is not responsible for faults or interruptions in the Service caused by the Customer or other circumstances beyond Internetport's control. Furthermore, Internetport is not responsible for faults or interruptions during:
termsAndConditions.section8List1: The time when Internetport carries out planned and necessary maintenance of the Service, which has been notified well in advance.
termsAndConditions.section8List2: The time when the Service has been suspended under the provisions of section 12.
termsAndConditions.section8Text3: 8.3 Internetport will rectify faults or interruptions for which it is responsible within a reasonable time from the Customer's fault report.
termsAndConditions.section8Text4: 8.4 If Internetport, after a fault report from the Customer, resolves an issue that is due to the Customer or circumstances the Customer is responsible for, Internetport has the right to compensation for troubleshooting work, other work, and additional costs.
termsAndConditions.section8Text5: 8.5 To enable Internetport to rectify faults and interruptions in the Service, the Customer is required to cooperate in troubleshooting and resolving the issue via email, telephone, or another suitable method. Internetport will determine the appropriate method based on the circumstances of the individual case.
termsAndConditions.section8Text6: 8.6 If the Customer does not participate in troubleshooting within a reasonable time in the manner specified by Internetport, the Customer may lose the right to a price reduction. A reasonable time shall be considered five (5) days.
termsAndConditions.section8Text7: 8.7 The Customer is entitled to a price reduction if the Service could not be used due to a fault in the Service, and the fault is due to Internetport or Internetport's partner, provided that the fault was reported in a timely manner and that the Customer participated in troubleshooting as requested by Internetport.
termsAndConditions.section8Text8: 8.8 A valid complaint must be submitted within a reasonable time from when the fault was discovered or should have been discovered. A reasonable time is generally considered to be three (3) months.
termsAndConditions.section8Text9: 8.9 The price reduction is limited to the portion of the fixed fee for the Service corresponding to the period during which the Service was unusable, calculated from the Customer's fault report.
termsAndConditions.section8Text10: 8.10 A Customer entitled to a price reduction must request it within six (6) months after the fault has been resolved. The price reduction is normally credited on the next invoice. Price reductions below twenty-five (25) SEK will not be paid out.
termsAndConditions.section8Text11: 8.11 The maximum price reduction is limited to the total amount of the Customer's fixed fees for the affected Service during the last thirty (30) days before the Customer's fault report.
termsAndConditions.section8Text12: 8.12 If multiple services are affected by the same fault, a price reduction is only granted for one (1) service.
termsAndConditions.section9Text1: 9.1 The Customer is only entitled to compensation for direct damages that have arisen due to Internetport's negligence.
termsAndConditions.section9Text2: 9.2 The Customer is not entitled to compensation for indirect damages, such as lost profits, additional costs for data traffic, or other consequential damages.
termsAndConditions.section9Text3: 9.3 Internetport's Services allow the Customer to access and/or transmit various types of information via the internet. As a provider of these Services, Internetport remains neutral, meaning that Internetport does not monitor or evaluate the content of the information the Customer sends and/or receives. As a neutral provider, Internetport is therefore not responsible for faults or damages caused by the content of the information transmitted via the Services.
termsAndConditions.section9Text4: 9.4 Unless otherwise specified by the terms of a specific supplementary service provided by Internetport to the Customer, Internetport is also not responsible for damages caused by malicious software such as computer viruses or similar, unauthorized access, delays, corruption, or loss of data that occur during the use of the Service.
termsAndConditions.section9Text5: 9.5 Internetport is not liable for any compensation obligations towards third parties.
termsAndConditions.section9Text6: 9.6 The limitations of Internetport's liability according to sections 9.1–9.5 above do not apply if Internetport caused the damage intentionally or through gross negligence or if Internetport is liable under law.
termsAndConditions.section10Title: 10. Contract Duration, Commitment Period, and Notice Period
termsAndConditions.section10Text1: 10.1 Unless otherwise stated in these terms or the Agreement, the contract remains in effect from the time it is concluded and continues indefinitely with a one-month notice period.
termsAndConditions.section10Text2: 10.2 If the parties have agreed on a specific commitment period, the following applies: If the Customer wishes to terminate the contract effective from the end of the commitment period, notice must be given at least one month before the end of the commitment period. Otherwise, the contract is automatically extended to continue indefinitely with a one-month notice period.
termsAndConditions.section10Text3: 10.3 If the Customer terminates a contract during an ongoing commitment period, the Customer is still obligated to pay fixed fees for the remaining commitment period.
termsAndConditions.section11Title: 11. Termination of the Agreement at the Customer's Request
termsAndConditions.section11Text1: 11.1 If termination is requested by the Customer, it is recommended that the Customer contact Internetport's customer service using the contact methods described on the Website. If Internetport has reason to verify the legitimacy of the termination, Internetport may require written confirmation. The Customer's termination must be confirmed in writing by Internetport with a notice of the contract's termination date.
termsAndConditions.section11Text2: 11.2 If changes to these terms or fees result in a disadvantage for the Customer, the Customer has the right to terminate the contract effective from the date the changes take effect, provided that termination occurs no later than thirty (30) days after the changes have been announced. If the Customer does not terminate the contract, they are considered to have accepted the announced changes.
termsAndConditions.section11Text3: 11.3 In the event of death, Internetport or a representative of the Customer's estate may terminate the contract by presenting a certified copy of the death certificate, with termination taking effect at the end of the calendar month in which Internetport is informed of the death. Otherwise, the contract will continue to be valid with the estate as the contracting party.
termsAndConditions.section12Text1: 12.1 If Internetport, after a credit check of the Customer or otherwise, has valid reason to question the Customer's ability to pay, Internetport has the right to terminate the Agreement with immediate effect.
termsAndConditions.section12Text2: 12.2 If Internetport's right or ability to distribute the Service to the property where the Service is used ends due to Internetport's agreement on connection to the property ceasing to be valid, Internetport has the right to terminate the Agreement with one (1) month's notice. If an agreement has been made for a fixed term, the agreement will end when the term has expired.
termsAndConditions.section12Text3: 12.3 If Internetport reasonably suspects that the Customer is not using the Service for normal private use or otherwise using the Service in violation of the Agreement, Internetport has the right to immediately suspend the Service if Internetport finds it appropriate. Non-normal private use includes, for example, various types of interconnection, causing damage or disturbances that affect Internetport, Internetport's systems, or others, such as spamming, spreading computer viruses, or other harmful code.
termsAndConditions.section12Text4: 12.4 If there are no specific reasons, the Customer will normally be warned before suspension and given the opportunity to immediately correct the situation.
termsAndConditions.section12Text5: 122.5 Internetport may also suspend the Service if a) such obligation follows from the law, b) the Customer, despite a reminder, does not pay the overdue invoice for the Service within ten (10) days, or c) the Customer requests it.
termsAndConditions.section12Text6: 12.6 The Customer is obligated to pay the fixed fee for the Service even during the time the Service is suspended.
termsAndConditions.section12Text7: 12.7 If the Service is reinstated after suspension, Internetport has the right to charge the Customer an administrative fee.
termsAndConditions.section12Text8: 12.8 If Internetport finds that the Customer is using the Service in violation of the Agreement or otherwise abusing the Service in such a way that damage, or a clear risk of damage, arises for Internetport or a third party, Internetport has the right to immediately suspend the Service.
termsAndConditions.section12Text9: 12.9 Internetport always has the right to terminate the Agreement with immediate effect if the Service has been suspended based on these terms and the Customer has not corrected the issue within an acceptable period. If Internetport terminates the Agreement under this point, the Customer is also obligated to compensate the damage caused to Internetport due to the Customer's breach of the Agreement.
termsAndConditions.section12Text10: 12.10 Internetport also has the right to terminate the Agreement with immediate effect if the Customer is significantly late with payment or repeatedly defaults on payments that are not minor. A significant delay is considered if the Customer, despite the suspension of the Service due to payment delay, does not pay the overdue invoice within fifteen (15) days after the suspension has begun.
termsAndConditions.section13Text1: 13.1 The Customer may not transfer the Agreement to another without consent from Internetport. A request for transfer must be made in the manner specified on the Website. In the case of a transfer, Internetport reserves the right to charge an administrative fee.
termsAndConditions.section13Text2: 13.2 Internetport has the right, without the Customer's consent, to transfer or assign its rights under the Agreement to another party in connection with the acquisition of the business providing the Service.
termsAndConditions.section14Text1: 14.1 The customer is responsible for ensuring that the contact information provided to Internetport is correct. The customer must notify Internetport of any changes to their visit, mail, invoice, and email address, as well as other contact information and details of service delivery, well in advance, but no later than immediately after the information has changed.
termsAndConditions.section14Text2: 14.2 The customer is responsible for the use of the service at the address to which the service is delivered according to the details provided to Internetport. The customer is therefore encouraged to notify Internetport of changes as described in point 14.1.
termsAndConditions.section14Text3: 14.3 The customer is obligated to fulfill the Agreement even if they move to a new address.
termsAndConditions.section14Text4: 14.4 If the customer wishes to move the delivery of the service to their new address, they must notify Internetport at least thirty (30) days in advance. Internetport will then inform the customer whether the service can be delivered to the new address. Internetport takes no responsibility for interruptions in service delivery when moving the delivery address due to the customer providing necessary information too late.
termsAndConditions.section14Text5: 14.5 Internetport reserves the right to charge a special moving fee. Current information regarding moving terms is available on the Website.
termsAndConditions.section14Text6: 14.6 If the customer still has a binding period on the Agreement and moves to another address, Internetport has the right to charge a final fee equivalent to the remaining fees during the binding period.
termsAndConditions.section15Title: 15. Change of Service, Fee, or Terms
termsAndConditions.section15Text1: 15.1 These general terms and conditions are valid until further notice. Any changes to terms must be notified at least thirty (30) days in advance via a message on the Website, letter, or email to the affected customers.
termsAndConditions.section15Text2: 15.2 Any increase in the customer's fee must be notified via email or letter at least thirty (30) days before the increase takes effect. See also 11.2.
termsAndConditions.section15Text3: 15.3 If the parties have agreed on a binding period for the service, any changes to the terms that are detrimental to the customer will not take effect until the end of the binding period. However, Internetport may change terms with immediate effect during the binding period if the change arises due to changes in the general price level, increased taxes and fees, increased prices from external subcontractors, government decisions, or changes in legislation.
termsAndConditions.section15Text4: 15.4 Internetport has the right to make changes to the service without prior notice to the customer, as long as the changes do not substantially affect the service's functionality.
termsAndConditions.section16Text1: 16.1 A party shall be relieved from liability, damages, and other consequences if the fulfillment of a specific obligation is prevented or significantly hindered by circumstances beyond the party's reasonable control or foresight. Such relieving circumstances may include lightning strikes, labor conflicts, fires, zombie apocalypses, changed regulations, government intervention, as well as errors or delays in services from subcontractors due to similar circumstances.
termsAndConditions.section17Text1: 17.1 Swedish law shall apply to the Agreement.
termsAndConditions.section17Text2: 17.2 In the event of a dispute between Internetport and the Customer, the parties shall first attempt to resolve it. If the parties cannot reach an agreement, the dispute may be resolved by the Swedish National Board for Consumer Disputes (ARN) or by a general court.

s1.title: S1. The Broadband Service
s1.text1: S1.1 The Broadband Service provides the Customer with an internet connection, access to email, and space for a personal website. Additional information about the Broadband Service is available on the Website.
s1.text2: S1.2 The speed at which the Customer is connected to the internet by using the Service is determined by the agreed subscription. The stated transfer speed is only approximate and may vary in practice.
s1.text3: S1.3 Internetport is not responsible for any loss or distortion of information or data, such as email, images, data information, information on the personal website, or information uploaded by the Customer. Internetport is also not responsible for any backup or copying of email, images, or other material belonging to the Customer that is processed via the Broadband Service.

s2.title: S2. The Telephony Service
s2.text1: S2.1 The Telephony Service means that the Customer can call telephone numbers both within Sweden and abroad. More information about Telephony and the additional services offered is available on the Website.
s2.text2: S2.2 For the use of Telephony, Internetport has the right to decide on credit limits. Information about credit limits is provided in connection with new subscription sign-ups.
s2.text3: S2.3 During the term of the agreement, Internetport has the right to lower or raise the Customer's credit limit with at least thirty (30) days' notice. Notice of any change to the credit limit is given via the Website or email.
s2.text4: S2.4 If Internetport lowers the credit limit during the term of the agreement, the Customer has the right to terminate the Agreement in accordance with clause 11.2. If the Customer uses the Telephony Service after the reduction has taken effect, this shall be deemed acceptance of the reduction.
s2.text5: S2.5 If the Customer exceeds the credit limit, Internetport has the right to block the service for all calls except emergency calls.
s2.text6: S2.6 Internetport has the right to terminate the Telephony Service if the Customer has not used the service for twelve (12) consecutive months.
s2.text7: S2.7 Before number portability (transfer of the Customer's existing telephone number from another operator) can be carried out for use in the Telephony Service, Internetport must ensure that portability is possible. Internetport will initiate the transfer, subject to any cooling-off period, as soon as possible. Internetport cannot guarantee that portability can be carried out.

purchaseTerms.title: Special terms for the purchase of equipment
purchaseTerms.text1: S3.1 The equipment is delivered as a postal package to the address provided by the Customer in their order or to the nearest collection point. Internetport has the right to charge a shipping fee, as indicated on Internetport's order page. If the equipment is not collected within fourteen (14) days from the notification that it is available for pickup, Internetport has the right to charge a return fee.
purchaseTerms.text2: S3.2 The equipment is normally delivered within two to five (2–5) business days unless otherwise stated on Internetport's order page.
purchaseTerms.text3: S3.3 If the Customer is already being invoiced for a Service provided by Internetport, the equipment will be paid for with the next invoice where the equipment is listed. Otherwise, Internetport will send a separate invoice together with the delivery of the equipment, with payment terms of thirty (30) days.
purchaseTerms.text4: S3.4 Internetport provides a twelve (12) month warranty on the equipment unless otherwise stated on the order page. The warranty means that Internetport will replace or repair equipment that is defective. The warranty does not cover faults due to impact, misuse, or incorrect use.
purchaseTerms.text5: S3.5 A Customer wishing to invoke the warranty should contact Internetport Customer Service via the Website or by phone. Internetport will cover the return shipping cost provided that the warranty applies and the Customer has followed Internetport's instructions for the return. Internetport has the right to examine the returned and claimed equipment for fourteen (14) days, and during this period is under no obligation to provide replacement equipment.

rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.title: Right of withdrawal and returns
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph1: If you are a private individual (consumer) and have entered into an agreement for a service or purchase of a product from Internetport remotely, e.g. via the Website or by phone through Internetport's customer service, the following applies.
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph2: According to the Act (2005:59) on distance contracts and contracts concluded outside business premises, you have the right to withdraw from your agreement.
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph3: If your agreement concerns a service, you have the right to withdraw from the agreement within fourteen (14) days after the agreement is concluded. If your agreement concerns the purchase of a product, you have the right to withdraw from your purchase within fourteen (14) days after you have received the product.
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph4: If you wish to withdraw from your agreement or purchase, you must notify Internetport's customer service. You can use Internetport's own withdrawal form available on Internetport's website or the form provided by the Swedish Consumer Agency available on their website. When Internetport has received your notice of withdrawal, we will promptly send a confirmation message.
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph5: If you wish to withdraw from a purchase of a product and have taken possession of the product, you must return the product to Internetport no later than fourteen (14) days after you have informed us that you wish to withdraw from your purchase. You will bear the return shipping cost. Return the product in its original packaging. As soon as we have received the returned product, you will receive a new message confirming that we have received it.
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph6: If you have paid for the product before withdrawing from your purchase, Internetport will promptly refund the amount you have paid for the product. The refund will be made no earlier than after we have received the returned product or evidence that you have returned the product, whichever occurs first. We will refund to the account that you specify. Direct debit refunds automatically.
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph7: If you have unpacked and used the product before withdrawing, or if the condition of the product deviates from its original state when we have received it, Internetport has the right to charge you for the depreciation of the product. The main rule is that the product should be in like-new condition.
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph8: If you withdraw from an agreement for a service and have paid for the service, we will refund the amount you have paid to us no later than within fourteen (14) days after we have received your notice of withdrawal. We will refund to the account that you specify.
rightOfWithdrawalAndReturns.paragraph9: If, in connection with the ordering of the service, you request to use the service during the withdrawal period and use the service before withdrawing, we will charge you a fee for the time you have used the service, in proportion to the regular price (excluding promotions or discounts) for the agreed service, including any setup fee.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.section1Paragraph1: INTERNETPORT cares about your personal privacy and always strives to protect your personal data in the best possible way. It is INTERNETPORT's goal to comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding personal data protection.
privacyPolicy.section1Paragraph2: This policy helps you understand what kind of information INTERNETPORT collects and how it is used. By accepting the policy on the Website in connection with a purchase or by providing your information, you consent to the processing of your personal data as described below. INTERNETPORT AB, 556537-1662, Sweden is responsible for processing your personal data.
privacyPolicy.section2Title: Which Personal Data Do We Process and How Do We Use It?
privacyPolicy.section2Paragraph1: We will process the personal data that you provide or have provided to us, or that we have collected on the Website through cookies, for the purpose of administering your purchases and fulfilling our commitments to you as a customer. The personal data processed by INTERNETPORT includes your personal identification number, name, gender, email address, purchase, payment and order history, delivery address, IP address, and telephone number.
privacyPolicy.section2Paragraph2: The data may also be used for identification, direct marketing, customer surveys, newsletters, and statistical purposes. It may also be used for mail, SMS, and email communications, as well as for marketing and information via telephone, unless you object. You may contact us at any time to stop marketing communications.
privacyPolicy.section2Paragraph3: Furthermore, the data may be used to analyze purchasing habits to provide you with relevant information and marketing, as well as to improve the Website, payment solutions, and payment processes. Processing for these purposes may include transferring your personal data, including your personal identification number, to other companies within the INTERNETPORT group and third-party providers for analysis.
privacyPolicy.section2Paragraph4: Personal data may also be merged with information from other registers, such as credit information registers. Your personal identification number will also be processed in connection with purchases on behalf of, or due to requirements from, payment and credit companies that need it for credit checks. Such processing may involve merging registers both within and outside the EU, and your personal data may be transferred to and processed by other companies within the INTERNETPORT group as well as by INTERNETPORT partners in accordance with applicable laws.
privacyPolicy.section2Paragraph5: The data may also be merged or shared with authorities or our partners, for example for printing and distribution, as well as with payment intermediaries and credit companies for payment or credit checks. INTERNETPORT always takes the utmost care in such cases. By accepting the policy on the Website, you also consent to your personal data being transferred to a country outside the EEA, and if all or part of INTERNETPORT's operations are sold or integrated with another business, your data may be disclosed to advisors, purchasers, and their advisors.
privacyPolicy.section3Title: How Do We Protect Your Personal Data?
privacyPolicy.section3Paragraph1: To keep the personal data we process securely stored, we have taken several security measures: We have implemented security routines and technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data, such as browser certification technology, firewalls, and antivirus programs. Access to the areas where the data is stored is restricted, and employees must be identified for access. INTERNETPORT also uses SSL (Secure Socket Layer) for secure data transmission over the Internet, and as a customer, you should ensure that SSL is enabled in your browser settings. One-way encryption is also used when processing your payment or credit card number to prevent unauthorized access.
privacyPolicy.section3Paragraph2: To ensure that our security measures remain current, we conduct regular audits and system updates. Additionally, our staff receives ongoing training in security protocols to minimize the risk of data breaches.
privacyPolicy.section4Title: How Long Do We Retain Your Personal Data?
privacyPolicy.section4Paragraph1: If you have consented to be a registered customer/member with INTERNETPORT, your data will be retained until you deregister. You can deregister as a customer at any time.
privacyPolicy.section4Paragraph2: If you do not register as a customer/member, your data will be retained only as long as necessary under legal requirements or to fulfill INTERNETPORT's or its partners' obligations to you, such as for delivery or warranty purposes. In any case, your data will never be stored longer than permitted by applicable data protection legislation.
privacyPolicy.section5Title: Access, Update, and Correction of Your Personal Data
privacyPolicy.section5Paragraph1: Under applicable data protection legislation, you have the right, once per calendar year and free of charge, to receive information about the personal data processed about you, regardless of how it was collected. If you wish to obtain this information, you must submit a written request sent by post to the address provided on the Website. The request must be signed by you, as it cannot be submitted by email.
privacyPolicy.section5Paragraph2: INTERNETPORT strives to ensure that your personal data is accurate and up to date. If any information you have provided changes, for example your email address, name, or payment details, or if you wish to cancel your account, please contact us via email at info@internetport.se. You have the right to request at any time that your personal data be corrected, blocked, or deleted, and to withdraw any consent for its processing. Please note that your personal data is not used for direct marketing if you object.
privacyPolicy.section6Title: Links and Changes to the Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.section6Paragraph1: The Website may contain links to other websites. This Privacy Policy applies only to the Website. When you are redirected, please review the applicable privacy policy for that site. INTERNETPORT is not responsible for other websites' processing of your personal data and reserves the right to make necessary changes to this policy, which will be published on the Website.

hero.subtitle: One of the planet's fastest VPN
hero.description: Protect your online privacy with NordVPN through Internetport. Secure, fast and reliable VPN service that keeps you anonymous online.

explainer.title: What is a VPN?
explainer.subtitle: A VPN (Virtual Private Network) creates a secure tunnel between your device and the internet, protecting your data and privacy.

features.name: Security Protection
features.description: Encrypts your internet traffic to protect sensitive information from hackers and cyber threats.

features.name: Anonymous Browsing
features.description: Hides your IP address and browsing history from internet providers and websites.

features.name: Global Access
features.description: Access content from around the world by connecting to servers in different countries.

features.name: Data Security
features.description: Secure your sensitive data on public Wi-Fi networks and unsecured connections.

whyVpn.title: Why choose NordVPN?
whyVpn.description: NordVPN leads the industry in speed, security, and features. See how we compare to other VPN providers.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most commonly asked questions about NordVPN and our service.

faqs.question: What is NordVPN and how does it work?
faqs.answer: NordVPN is a leading VPN service that protects your internet connection and online privacy. By encrypting your data and hiding your IP address, NordVPN ensures you can browse anonymously and securely.

faqs.question: How do I install NordVPN on my devices?
faqs.answer: You can easily install NordVPN on your devices by downloading the app from our website or app store. Follow the installation guide to configure the service on Windows, macOS, iOS, Android, and other platforms.

faqs.question: Which devices and platforms does NordVPN support?
faqs.answer: NordVPN supports a wide range of devices and platforms, including Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, Android, routers, and smart TVs. You can connect up to ten devices simultaneously with a single account.

faqs.question: How secure is NordVPN?
faqs.answer: NordVPN uses advanced encryption technology and security protocols to protect your data. We have a strict no-logs policy and offer features like Kill Switch and DNS leak protection for extra security.

faqs.question: Can I use NordVPN to stream content and access geo-blocked material?
faqs.answer: Yes, NordVPN is excellent for streaming content from various platforms like Netflix, Hulu, BBC iPlayer, and many more. By connecting to one of NordVPN's servers in the country where the content is available, you can easily bypass geo-blocks and access your favorite material regardless of where you are. NordVPN's servers are optimized for high speed and stability, providing a smooth streaming experience.

faqs.question: What is a Kill Switch and how does it work?
faqs.answer: Kill Switch is a security feature that automatically disconnects your internet connection if the VPN connection is interrupted. This prevents your real IP address and data from being exposed.

faqs.question: How do I contact NordVPN customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact NordVPN customer support 24/7 via live chat or email. NordVPN's support team is always ready to help you with any questions or issues.

finalCta.subtitle: Explore our complete range of security solutions for total online protection.

broadbandType.question: What is the difference between fixed and mobile broadband?
broadbandType.answer:
Fixed broadband is tied to your address (usually via fiber or cable) and provides a stable, constant connection with unlimited data.
Mobile broadband uses the mobile network, making it portable. It's perfect on the go, but speed and stability can vary depending on coverage.

security.question: How do I protect my network and my router?
security.answer:
Change default passwords: The first and most important step is to change both the router's administrator password and the name of your WiFi network (SSID).
Create a guest network: Most modern routers allow you to create a separate network for guests and smart devices (like speakers or vacuum cleaners). This isolates them from your private devices like computers and mobile phones.
Be careful with links: Never click on suspicious links in emails or messages, as they can give hackers access to your network.
